response.overview: Firefighter Sam and his team are always on duty in the beautiful harbor town of Pontypandy. No matter whether James gets into distress during a seal sighting on the open sea, Norman and Mandy have to be rescued from a raging river or the dog Buddler is stuck on a ledge with a dinosaur fossil - Sam and his team always rush to help and show what courage can do , willingness to help and team spirit can achieve anything. Attention Fire Department Sam fans - Sam and his rescue team are finally coming back to the cinema with five fast-paced and funny adventures! And these really have it all! In addition to daring rescue missions, this time the animals in the Welsh coastal town are making a big impact: beavers, seals, cats and many more... there is something for everyone
response.title: Fireman Sam - Animal Rescues

results.name: FEUERWEHRMANN SAM - TIERISCHE HELDEN Trailer Deutsch (2024)
